[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@remirror/core-helpers](./core-helpers.md)

## core-helpers package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Merge](./core-helpers.merge.md) | Use this to completely overwrite an object when merging.
```ts
const source = { awesome: { a: 'a' } }
const target = { awesome: { b: 'b' } }
const result = deepMerge(source, target) // => { awesome: { a: 'a', b: 'b' } }

const overwriteTarget = { awesome: Merge.overwrite({ b: 'b' }) }
const overwriteResult = deepMerge(source, overwriteTarget) // => { awesome: { b: 'b' } }

```
 |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Memoize](./core-helpers.memoize.md) | This is required since it is not exported from <code>fastMemomize</code> |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [bool](./core-helpers.bool.md) | Shorthand for casting a value to it's boolean equivalent. |
|  [callIfDefined](./core-helpers.callifdefined.md) | Calls a function if defined and provides compile time type checking for the passed in parameters. |
|  [capitalize](./core-helpers.capitalize.md) | Capitalizes a string value. |
|  [Cast](./core-helpers.cast.md) | Type cast an argument. If no type is provided it will default to any. |
|  [clamp](./core-helpers.clamp.md) | Clamps the value to the provided range. |
|  [cleanupOS](./core-helpers.cleanupos.md) | A utility function to clean up the Operating System name. |
|  [clone](./core-helpers.clone.md) | Clones a plain object using object spread notation |
|  [deepMerge](./core-helpers.deepmerge.md) | A deep merge which only merges plain objects and Arrays. It clones the object before the merge so will not mutate any of the passed in values.<!-- -->To completely remove a key you can use the <code>Merge</code> helper class which replaces it's key with a completely new object |
|  [entries](./core-helpers.entries.md) | A typesafe implementation of <code>Object.entries</code>Taken from https://github.com/biggyspender/ts-entries/blob/master/src/ts-entries.ts |
|  [findMatches](./core-helpers.findmatches.md) | Finds all the regex matches for a string |
|  [flattenArray](./core-helpers.flattenarray.md) | Flattens an array |
|  [format](./core-helpers.format.md) | Trim and conditionally capitalize string values. |
|  [get](./core-helpers.get.md) | Get a property from an object or array by a string path or an array path. |
|  [hasOwnProperty](./core-helpers.hasownproperty.md) | Safe implementation of hasOwnProperty with typechecking. |
|  [includes](./core-helpers.includes.md) | A more lenient typed version of <code>Array.prototype.includes</code> which allow less specific types to be checked. |
|  [isAndroidOS](./core-helpers.isandroidos.md) | A utility function to check whether the current browser is running on the android platform. |
|  [isArray](./core-helpers.isarray.md) | Alias the isArray method. |
|  [isBoolean](./core-helpers.isboolean.md) | Predicate check that value is boolean |
|  [isClass](./core-helpers.isclass.md) | Predicate check that value is a class |
|  [isDate](./core-helpers.isdate.md) | Predicate check that value is a date |
|  [isDirectInstanceOf](./core-helpers.isdirectinstanceof.md) | Check if an instance is the direct instance of the provided class. |
|  [isEmptyArray](./core-helpers.isemptyarray.md) | Predicate check that value is an empty array |
|  [isEmptyObject](./core-helpers.isemptyobject.md) | Predicate check that value is an empty object |
|  [isEqual](./core-helpers.isequal.md) | Alias for fast deep equal |
|  [isError](./core-helpers.iserror.md) | Predicate check that value is an error |
|  [isFunction](./core-helpers.isfunction.md) | Predicate check that value is a function |
|  [isInstanceOf](./core-helpers.isinstanceof.md) | A shorthand method for creating instance of checks. |
|  [isInteger](./core-helpers.isinteger.md) | Helper function for Number.isInteger check allowing non numbers to be tested |
|  [isMap](./core-helpers.ismap.md) | Predicate check that value is a <code>Map</code> |
|  [isNativePromise](./core-helpers.isnativepromise.md) | Predicate check that value is a native promise |
|  [isNull](./core-helpers.isnull.md) | Predicate check that value is null |
|  [isNullOrUndefined](./core-helpers.isnullorundefined.md) | Utility predicate check that value is either null or undefined |
|  [isNumber](./core-helpers.isnumber.md) | Predicate check that value is a number.<!-- -->Also by default doesn't include NaN as a valid number. |
|  [isObject](./core-helpers.isobject.md) | Predicate check that value is an object |
|  [isPlainObject](./core-helpers.isplainobject.md) | Predicate check for whether passed in value is a plain object |
|  [isPromise](./core-helpers.ispromise.md) | Predicate check that value has the promise api implemented |
|  [isRegExp](./core-helpers.isregexp.md) | Predicate check that value is a RegExp |
|  [isSafeInteger](./core-helpers.issafeinteger.md) | Helper function for Number.isSafeInteger allowing for unknown values to be tested |
|  [isSet](./core-helpers.isset.md) | Predicate check that value is a <code>Set</code> |
|  [isString](./core-helpers.isstring.md) | Predicate check that value is a string |
|  [isSymbol](./core-helpers.issymbol.md) | Predicate check that value is a symbol |
|  [isUndefined](./core-helpers.isundefined.md) | Predicate check that value is undefined |
|  [kebabCase](./core-helpers.kebabcase.md) | Returns the kebab cased form of a string.<!-- -->Taken from https://github.com/angus-c/just/blob/master/packages/string-kebab-case/index.js kebabCase('the quick brown fox'); // 'the-quick-brown-fox' kebabCase('the-quick-brown-fox'); // 'the-quick-brown-fox' kebabCase('the\_quick\_brown\_fox'); // 'the-quick-brown-fox' kebabCase('theQuickBrownFox'); // 'the-quick-brown-fox' kebabCase('theQuickBrown Fox'); // 'the-quick-brown-fox' kebabCase('thequickbrownfox'); // 'thequickbrownfox' kebabCase('the - quick \* brown\# fox'); // 'the-quick-brown-fox' kebabCase('theQUICKBrownFox'); // 'the-q-u-i-c-k-brown-fox' |
|  [keys](./core-helpers.keys.md) | A typesafe implementation of <code>Object.keys</code> |
|  [last](./core-helpers.last.md) | Get the last element of the array. |
|  [memoize](./core-helpers.memoize.md) | Alias for caching function calls |
|  [noop](./core-helpers.noop.md) | Sometimes doing nothing is the best policy. |
|  [omit](./core-helpers.omit.md) | Alias for excluding properties from an object |
|  [omitUndefined](./core-helpers.omitundefined.md) |  |
|  [pick](./core-helpers.pick.md) | Alias for picking properties from an object |
|  [randomFloat](./core-helpers.randomfloat.md) | Generate a random float between min and max. If only one parameter is provided minimum is set to 0. |
|  [randomInt](./core-helpers.randomint.md) | Generate a random integer between min and max. If only one parameter is provided minimum is set to 0. |
|  [range](./core-helpers.range.md) | Create a range from start to end.<!-- -->If only start is provided it creates an array of the size provided. if start and end are provided it creates an array who's first position is start and final position is end. i.e. <code>length = (end - start) + 1</code> |
|  [sort](./core-helpers.sort.md) | Sorts an array while retaining the original order when the compare method identifies the items as equal.<code>Array.prototype.sort()</code> is unstable and so values that are the same will jump around in a non deterministic manner. Here I'm using the index as a fallback. If two elements have the same priority the element with the lower index is placed first hence retaining the original order. |
|  [startCase](./core-helpers.startcase.md) | Converts a string, including strings in camelCase or snake\_case, into Start Case (a variant of Title Case where all words start with a capital letter), it keeps original single quote and hyphen in the word.<!-- -->'management\_companies' to 'Management Companies' 'managementCompanies' to 'Management Companies' <code>hell's kitchen</code> to <code>Hell's Kitchen</code> <code>co-op</code> to <code>Co-op</code> |
|  [take](./core-helpers.take.md) | Takes a number of elements from the provided array starting from the zero-index |
|  [trim](./core-helpers.trim.md) | Removes leading and trailing whitespace from a string. |
|  [uniqueArray](./core-helpers.uniquearray.md) | Create a unique array in a non-mutating manner |
|  [uniqueBy](./core-helpers.uniqueby.md) | Create a unique array of objects from a getter function or a property list. |
|  [uniqueId](./core-helpers.uniqueid.md) | Generate a unique id |
|  [within](./core-helpers.within.md) | Check that a number is within the minimum and maximum bounds of a set of numbers. |
